text:
Marilyn Monroe, clowns and a dead meme: 16 halloween costumes from world celebrities
01 Nov 2019, 15:45 by Daria Gromova
Find out what the Kardashians, Kristen Stewart, and other stars did last night.
Halloween is behind, and in the west it has traditionally been celebrated on a grand scale. Some decorations of houses are worth it! But the main thing in the holiday is, of course, costume parties. We made a selection of vivid Halloween images from celebrities.
Heidi Klum is known for her attentive attitude to Halloween costumes, but this year she surpassed herself. Her suit was applied for 8 hours (on Instagram, the actress has more photos of the process and the final image).



Jason Momoa that we deserve.



An excellent Marilyn Monroe came out of Kylie Jenner.



Kim Kardashian transformed into the main character of "Legally Blonde."



And her sister Chloe is in Cruella de Ville.



Nicki Minaj changed into Harley Quinn (we are not hinting at anything, but).



Ariana Grande went in a different direction and scared the fans in a way inspired by one of the episodes of the series ‚ÄúTwilight Zone‚Äù of the 60s.



Jensen Ackles from "Supernatural" tried on the role of Batman.



And Cardi B was transformed into Poison Ivy - one of his opponents.



The Batman universe was generally popular: here is Catwoman from Bella Hadid.



And her sister Gigi went in the classics and perfectly pulled out the image of Jim Carrey from the movie "Mask".



Cristiano Ronaldo in the image of a creepy clown sitting on a slightly less creepy clown.



Another sports star, basketball player LeBron James, was dressed in a detailed suit of Edward Scissorhands from the movie of the same name by Tim Burton.



Kristen Stewart collected all the stereotypical "images" for Halloween in one. It turned out to be a walking dead meme.



Charlie Cox and Tom Hiddleston switched roles.



Finn Fulfgard from ‚ÄúVery Strange Things‚Äù turned into Hopper for one night. Apparently, so that the fans are not so bored.
